subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Because Manny Ramírez’s relationship with the Red Sox ended with some lingering questions about his behavior, Commissioner Bud Selig asked Rob Manfred, one of baseball’s executive vice presidents, to conduct interviews on the topic. Selig and Manfred declined comment Friday, but baseball officials said Manfred’s exploration had ended and would not lead to any disciplining.
